comment: I LOVE JINKS! Let me start by saying I have never written one of these and never cared enough to. HE ISTHE BEST AT KSU! He cares on a human level not just "student". His lectures are fun and forces you out of your comfort zone. The lowest grade I got- my fault. He is so understanding and helpful!! Wish there were more professors like him!

Jinks is an awesome professor! The class was very entertaining. I would definitely knock the paper out asap and get that finish. Everything else is smooth sailing. There are a few Quizlets of the test for studying purposes. I would also advise a Groupme therefore everyone is pushing together. This class will challenge your thinking and patience.

Jinks is amazing and one of KSU's best professors! However, the class can be kind of boring. There are so many group presentations/project presentation and after every presentation, the class usually rambles for a half hour about their opinions and I'm just sitting there like who cares, shut up.

Professor Jinks is awesome. He gives great feedback on your papers, and as long as you try, he will give you the grades. His lectures are actually fun and every week we learned something new through in-class scenario presentations. Just do the assignments he asks you to do and know well of the APA format. You will be fine!

Professor Jinks was awesome! He gives online quizzes every chapter and the answers are all online. There were also two group projects that were actually fun to work on, a paper, and two tests. The class was extremely easy and Professor Jinks was a lot of fun throughout the semester. I highly recommend you take him!!!
Great class! Amazing professor, very personable and friendly. Class has a lot of work so be prepared for group projects. You do a lot of different things every class period, extremely interesting.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Excellent class! Definitely a lot of work. Friendly teacher who provides feedback. Make sure you attend all classes, if you miss one class, you miss a lot of valuable info.
